text: The 1964 Manyas earthquake happened on October 6 on the southern coast of Marmara Sea near the city of Karacabey in Bursa Province, Turkey. The shock had a moment magnitude of 6.8 and a maximum Mercalli intensity of IX (Violent). Around $5 million in damage was caused, with 19–73 killed and 100–239 injured. ==See also== * List of earthquakes in 1964 * List of earthquakes in Turkey ==References== ==Further reading== * ==External links== * Category:Earthquakes in Turkey Category:1964 earthquakes Category:History of Bursa Province Category:Manyas Manyas earthquake Category:October 1964 events
title: 1964 Manyas earthquake
